data.actual_result: The number changed to the name of the channel.
data.expected_result: The number should remain as it is, because you didn't intend to link. Right?
data.short_description: Channel linking partially occurs even though unintended
data.steps_to_repro: - Copy the ID of any channel in a server.  - Go in any chat and write it like this: <channnel-id> (without a # sign) - Try to edit the message.
